name: Their walls are moving (Lorhus)
description:
This game was made in Oct 2020 for the Beginner's Circle Jam 3 : https://itch.io/jam/beginners-circle-jam-3. It was originally uploaded on time by Gonza-L, who removed their itch.io page, so it no longer appears in the submissions list.

Made in 2 weeks by :

- Jimmy Benecasa (sound design, music) : https://www.jimmybenecasa.com/

- Gonza-L (programming, level design)

- Lorhus (programming, art) : https://lorenzokerbrat.itch.io/
